revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Eterna Forest |image = [[File:Eterna Forest.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Eterna Forest. |tokens = 48,000 |location = On the North part of Route 205. }} '''Eterna Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 812,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly || rowspan=2| [[File:Bookworms.png|40px]] Bookworms Jack & Briana || rowspan=2|[[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Silcoon.png|40px]] Silcoon, [[File:Beautifly.png|40px]] Beautifly, [[File:Pachirisu.png|40px]] Pachirisu |- | [[File:Hoothoot.png|40px]] Hoothoot |- | [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple || rowspan=2| [[File:Melded_Minds_(both).png|40px]] Melded Minds Linsey & Elijah || rowspan=2|[[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra, [[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra |- | [[File:Silcoon.png|40px]] Silcoon |- | [[File:Cascoon.png|40px]] Cascoon || rowspan=2| [[File:Bug_Buds.png|40px]] Bug Buds Philip & Donald || rowspan=2|[[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Cascoon.png|40px]] Cascoon, [[File:Dustox.png|40px]] Dustox, [[File:Burmy.png|40px]] Burmy (plant), [[File:Kricketune.png|40px]] Kricketune |- | [[File:Bidoof.png|40px]] Bidoof |- | [[File:Kricketot.png|40px]] Kricketot || rowspan=3| [[File:Melded_Minds_(both).png|40px]] Melded Minds Kody & Rachael || rowspan=3|[[File:Meditite.png|40px]] Meditite, [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Budew.png|40px]] Budew |- | [[File:Buneary.png|40px]] Buneary |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- |[[File:Beautifly.png|40px]] Beautifly || rowspan=2 | <center>3,950,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=2 | <center>N/A |- |[[File:Dustox.png|40px]] Dustox |}

<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Cheri}} || N/A || 15.00% || 14.43% || 12.13% |- | {{Bag2|Oran}} || N/A || 15.00% || 14.43% || 12.13% |- | {{Bag2|Razz}} || N/A || 15.00% || 14.43% || 12.13% |- | {{Bag2|Bluk}} || N/A || 15.00% || 14.43% || 12.13% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 15.00% || 14.43% || 12.13% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 20.01% || 21.04% || 25.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.61% || 5.05% |- | {{Bag2|Meadow Plate}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.61% || 5.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |- | {{Bag2|Silver Powder}} || N/A || 0.50% || 0.80% || 2.02% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Cheri}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | {{Bag2|Oran}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | {{Bag2|Razz}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | {{Bag2|Bluk}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 24.00% || 24.00% || 24.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | {{Bag2|Meadow Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Silver Powder}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |} </tab> </tabs>
